entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
